code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Restaurants(){const[restaurants,setRestaurants]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/restaurants').then(res=>setRestaurants(res.data)).catch(()=>setRestaurants([]));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-red-500 mb-6 text-center",children:"Zwiggy Restaurants"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:restaurants.map(r=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-xl shadow p-6 flex flex-col items-start hover:shadow-lg transition",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2 text-gray-800",children:r.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500 mb-4",children:r.address}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/restaurants/${r._id}`,className:"mt-auto text-red-500 hover:underline font-medium",children:"View Menu"})]},r._id))})]});}export default Restaurants;
